server - package server
 
Server - Class in server
Server is a class that allows sending information to the client

setDataBarChart(int, String) - Method in class client.Controller
Set data for the Bar chart in the fifth tab This chart compares the average of a subject for all classes of a level
setDataLineChart(int, String) - Method in class client.Controller
Set data for the Line chart in the seventh tab This chart show the distribution of marks for a given subject of a level classes given
setDataLineChartExam(int, String, int) - Method in class client.Controller
Set data for the Line chart in the sixth tab This chart show the distribution of marks for a given exam of a level classes given
setDataLineChartOverallAverage(int) - Method in class client.Controller
Set data for the Line chart in the eighth tab This chart shows the distribution of the overall average for the subject of a level classes given

setDataTableStudent(String, String) - Method in class client.Controller

stop() - Method in class client.Client
